description: Forwarded if ServerView application receives a trap to be forwarded -
it is a generic trap

event.Summary: ServerView forwarded traps it received from $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniSvGenericTrapForward SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniServerViewServerName s EXAMPLE SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniServerViewTrapTime i 9999 SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniServerViewOrigServerName s EXAMPLE SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniServerViewOrigTrapName s EXAMPLE

description: Name of server the trap occured
variables.name: SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniServerViewServerName

description: Time the trap occured (in seconds since 01/01/1970 00:00h)
variables.name: SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniServerViewTrapTime

description: Name of the server this forwarded trap originally comes from
variables.name: SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniServerViewOrigServerName

description: Name this forwarded trap originally had
variables.name: SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniServerViewOrigTrapName

description: Turn off the specified pager at the ServerView frontend application.
This trap was moved from the SNI Trap-MIB to this MIB because of
a trap ID conflict with SNI Mylex-MIB.

event.Summary: Specified pager disabled in ServerView frontend application

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniSvPagerOff SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniServerViewServerName s EXAMPLE SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniServerViewTrapTime i 9999 SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniServerViewNumber i 9999

description: Name of server the trap occured
variables.name: SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniServerViewServerName

description: Time the trap occured (in seconds since 01/01/1970 00:00h)
variables.name: SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniServerViewTrapTime

description: Generic parameter for any numeric number
variables.name: SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniServerViewNumber

description: Generated by ServerView application if Server changes state (manageable/not manageable)
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniSvServerStateChanged SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniServerViewServerName s EXAMPLE SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniServerViewTrapTime i 9999 SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniServerViewState s EXAMPLE

description: Name of server the trap occured
variables.name: SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniServerViewServerName

description: Time the trap occured (in seconds since 01/01/1970 00:00h)
variables.name: SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniServerViewTrapTime

description: New state of server
variables.name: SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniServerViewState

description: Forwarded if ServerView application receives a trap to be forwarded -
the original ServerName and Severity is retained

event.Summary: ServerView forwarded eligible traps upon reception

description: Sent to all ServerView clients that had registered a notification port if
one or more servers were added to the server list.
The argument fscSvObjectName may be empty. In that case the SeverView database must be explored.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::fscSvServerAdded SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniServerViewServerName s EXAMPLE SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniServerViewTrapTime i 9999 SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::fscSvObjectName s EXAMPLE

description: Name of server the trap occured

variables.name: SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::sniServerViewTrapTime

description: Name of an object (server/group)
variables.name: SNI-SERVERVIEW-MIB::fscSvObjectName

description: Sent to all ServerView clients that had registered a notification port if
one or more servers were removed from the server list.
The argument fscSvObjectName may be empty. In that case the SeverView database must be explored.

description: Sent to all ServerView clients that had registered a notification port if
one or more servers were changed in the server list.
The argument fscSvObjectName may be empty. In that case the SeverView database must be explored.
